message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.IR. 

This paper is about lexical simplification, which is a natural language processing task. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also makes use of BERT, which is a popular deep learning model, so cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning) are also likely sub-categories. Additionally, the paper involves experimentation and evaluation, which suggests that it could also belong to cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) or cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
